screens.title: Variables: Labeled Storage Boxes üì¶
screens.analogy: A variable is like a labeled box where you can store a value. You give it a name (like 'age' or 'name') and put data inside it. Later, you can use that name to refer to the value stored in the box.
screens.tip: Variables let you store and reuse values. Give them meaningful names!
